metadata.synopsis: One of the spawns that ambushed the player & Astarion gets teleported away.Astarion comments on that.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Ctrl+Shift+7 (Origin Debug Book)Astarion - Recruit - As CompanionAstarion - Origin Moments - Act 3 Vampire AmbushWalk in the direction the characters are facing.A dialog will be started. Finish the dialog.Reduce one of the spawns below 15% of health.

0.speaker: Astarion
0.text: You can teleport now? Cazador doesn't want to lose anyone else, I suppose.
0.context: NodeContext: Just watched another vampire spawn teleport away. Astarion's a little surprised - HE can't do that...
